name: Robert V.
text: Turning the page, as we all should...

name: Robert V.
text: Then maybe we could live happily, together.

name: Chris
text: What's this, some kind of purgatory ? Here to atone for my sins ?

name: Earch
text: It's more complicated than that, I can't tell you myself what's going to happen next.

name: Chris
text: And... I'm here to... move on ?
